channel.title: Feature Announcements on Modern survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Feature Announcements on Modern survey data analysis

item.title: US only: new activity filter applied to Profiles respondents
item.description: Moving forward there will be an additional ‘activity’ quota that panellists must meet before their data is included in Profiles.

item.title: New Profiles Taxonomy
item.description: Users can now view the new Profiles taxonomy in all markets

item.title: Creating multitables using filters
item.description: Users can now use filters and variables to define columns in their multitables

item.title: Removing Likes from Profiles
item.description: Likes data will be removed from YouGov Profiles in our US and UK datasets on September 6th, 2020

item.title: Customise your tables and graphs for export
item.description: Hide rows/columns, reorder rows/columns and edit labels. Click here to learn more.

item.title: Building custom variables with the interactions of two existing variables
item.description: Cross one variable by another with the new Interaction variable builder. Click here to learn more

item.title: Introduction of ‘Transitioning’ variable folder(s)
item.description: When new variables replace legacy variables, legacy variables will now be moved to a ‘Transitioning’ folder. Click here to learn more.

item.title: Population Estimate Calculation Update
item.description: Population estimate calculations now use the complete cases base size for all Filters.

item.title: Low Base Size Warning Release
item.description: When analysing samples below 100, variables / data-bars will now appear grey rather than the usual blue data-bars and black text. Z-score will remain in color.

item.title: Complete Cases Release
item.description: Complete Cases Checkbox for Custom Audiences
